languages.text: {n}Словно впав в некий транс, Кассия прикрывает глаза:{/n} "В этом монолите было столько силы, столько возможностей... С ним способности навигаторов нашего Дома становились сильнее в разы. Нет. В десятки раз! Но плата была слишком высока — спустя считанные часы взаимодействия монолит выжигал сознание своих носителей. И потому было решено расколоть его на множество осколков, энергию которых было легче подчинить человеческой воле".

traits.locale_text: {n}Словно впав в некий транс, Кассия прикрывает глаза:{/n} "В этом камне было столько силы, столько возможностей... С ним способности Навигаторов нашего Дома становились сильнее в разы. Нет. В десятки раз! Но плата была слишком высока — спустя считанные часы взаимодействия камень выжигал сознание своих носителей. И потому было решено расколоть его на множество осколков, энергию которых было легче подчинить человеческой воле".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."
languages.original_text: {n}Словно впав в некий транс, Кассия прикрывает глаза:{/n} "В этом монолите было столько силы, столько возможностей... С ним способности навигаторов нашего Дома становились сильнее в разы. Нет. В десятки раз! Но плата была слишком высока — спустя считанные часы взаимодействия монолит выжигал сознание своих носителей. И потому было решено расколоть его на множество осколков, энергию которых было легче подчинить человеческой воле".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはトランス状態になったかのように目を閉じて語る。{/n}「この石に封じられた大きな力は大きなチャンスでした…あたくしたち航宙士の能力を数倍に引き上げるもの。いえ、数十倍に増幅するものです！しかし、あまりも甚大な代償を払いました。使い始めてからわずか数時間で、石は必ず持ち主の精神を焼きつくしてしまうのです。そこで、モノリスを破壊して数多の破片にする決断がなされました。そうすれば、一個人がその力を制御しやすくなると考えて」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはトランス状態になったかのように目を閉じて語る。{/n}「この石に封じられた大きな力は大きなチャンスでした…あたくしたち航宙士の能力を数倍に引き上げるもの。いえ、数十倍に増幅するものです！しかし、あまりも甚大な代償を払いました。使い始めてからわずか数時間で、石は必ず持ち主の精神を焼きつくしてしまうのです。そこで、モノリスを破壊して数多の破片にする決断がなされました。そうすれば、一個人がその力を制御しやすくなると考えて」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅闭上了眼睛，神情恍惚地开了口。{/n}“这块巨石里蕴藏着如此强大的力量，如此丰富的可能性……它可以让我们导航者的力量增强几倍，不，可以增强几十倍。但力量的代价太沉重了，只要几个小时，这块石头就会灼烧使用者的心智。正因如此，提西福涅决定打碎那块巨型灵魂石，把它变成无数碎片。这样一来，人类的意志就更容易控制它的力量了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅闭上了眼睛，神情恍惚地开了口。{/n}“这块巨石里蕴藏着如此强大的力量，如此丰富的机遇……它可以让我们导航者的力量增强几倍，不，可以增强几十倍。但力量的代价太沉重了，只要几个小时，这块石头就会灼烧使用者的心智。正因如此，提西福涅决定打碎那块巨型灵魂石，把它变成无数碎片。这样一来，人类的意志就更容易控制它的力量了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia ferme les yeux et vous répond comme en transe :{/n} « Cette pierre renfermait tant de puissance, tant de possibilités... Elle devait permettre de multiplier les capacités de nos navigateurs par deux... non, par dix, voire plus ! Mais le prix à payer était trop élevé. Après seulement quelques heures d'utilisation, la pierre finissait toujours par dévorer l'esprit de son hôte. La décision a donc été prise de briser le Monolithe en de nombreux morceaux, afin que les humains puissent les contrôler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia ferme les yeux et vous répond comme en transe :{/n} « Cette pierre renfermait tant de puissance, tant de possibilités... Elle devait permettre de multiplier les capacités de nos navigateurs par deux... non, par dix, voire plus ! Mais le prix à payer était trop élevé. Après seulement quelques heures d'utilisation, la pierre finissait toujours par dévorer l'esprit de son hôte. La décision a donc été prise de briser le Monolithe en de nombreux morceaux, afin que les humains puissent les contrôler. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia cierra los ojos y habla como en un trance:{/n} «Había tantísimo poder en el interior de esta piedra, tantas posibilidades... Podría hacer que nuestros Navegantes fueran mucho más poderosos. No... ¡decenas de veces más poderosos! Pero el precio era demasiado alto. Tras unas horas de uso, la piedra siempre acaba por consumir la mente de su portador. Por eso se decidió romper el Monolito en fragmentos, para facilitar que la voluntad humana pudiera controlarlos».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia cierra los ojos y habla como en un trance:{/n} «Había tantísimo poder en el interior de esta piedra, tantas oportunidades... Podría hacer que nuestros Navegantes fueran mucho más poderosos. No... ¡decenas de veces más poderosos! Pero el precio era demasiado alto. Tras unas horas de uso, la piedra siempre acaba por consumir la mente de su portador. Por eso se decidió romper el Monolito en fragmentos, para facilitar que la voluntad humana pudiera controlarlos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia schließt die Augen und spricht wie in Trance:{/n} "Es war eine solche Macht in diesem Stein eingesperrt, solche Möglichkeiten ... Er könnte die Fähigkeiten unserer Navigatoren deutlich verstärken. Nein, er würde sie um ein Dutzendfaches verstärken! Doch der Preis war zu hoch. Nach wenigen Stunden der Nutzung hat der Stein den Verstand seines Wirts unweigerlich verbrannt. Daher wurde entschieden, den Monolith in viele Splitter zu zerbrechen, die für einen menschlichen Willen viel leichter zu kontrollieren waren."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia schließt die Augen und spricht wie in Trance:{/n} "Es war eine solche Macht in diesem Stein eingesperrt, solche Gelegenheiten ... Er könnte die Fähigkeiten unserer Navigatoren deutlich verstärken. Nein, er würde sie um ein Dutzendfaches verstärken! Doch der Preis war zu hoch. Nach wenigen Stunden der Nutzung hat der Stein den Verstand seines Wirts unweigerlich verbrannt. Daher wurde entschieden, den Monolith in viele Splitter zu zerbrechen, die für einen menschlichen Willen viel leichter zu kontrollieren waren."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, gözlerini kapatıp transa girmişçesine konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu taşın içinde çok fazla güç, çok büyük imkânlar vardı. Bu taşla Rotacılarımızın kabiliyetlerini kat kat güçlendirebilir, hatta onlarca kat artırabilirdik! Lakin bedeli çok ağırdı. Sadece birkaç saat kullandıktan sonra taş, kullananın aklını daima yakıp kül eder oldu. Bu yüzden Monolit'i pek çok küçük parçaya bölmeye karar verildi. Böylece insan iradesince kontrol edilmesi kolaylaşacaktı."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and speaks as if in a trance:{/n} "There was such power locked within this stone, such possibilities... It would make our Navigators' abilities several times stronger. No. It would magnify them by a factor of dozens! But the price was too high. After mere hours of use, the stone would always burn the minds of its hosts. So it was decided to break the Monolith into many shards, which were far easier for a human will to control."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, gözlerini kapatıp transa girmişçesine konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu taşın içine kilitlenmiş çok güç vardı, çok büyük imkanlar... Bunun sayesinde Rotacılarımızın kabiliyetlerini kat kat güçlendirebilirdik. Hatta onlarca kat artırabilirdik! Lakin bedeli çok ağırdı. Sadece birkaç saat kullandıktan sonra taş, kullananın aklını daima yakıp kül ediyordu. Bu yüzden Monolit'i pek çok küçük parçaya bölmeye karar verildi. Böylece insan iradesinin bunu kontrol etmesi daha kolay olacaktı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
